content.gathalast: Tehi nāgehi parivuto, ramissati ayaṃ naro.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
content.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Tava ñāṇaṃ pakittetvā, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
Sabbattha sukhito homi, phalaṃ me ñāṇakittane.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
content.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bhaddālitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Acchā dīpī ca mayūrā, karavīkā ca sāḷikā;
‘‘Sīhā byagghā varāhā ca, accha vaka (sī. pī.), bakā (syā.), vakā (ka.) kokataracchakā;
content.gathalast: Atimuttā asokā ca, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ pupphanti mama assame (sī. pī.).
Kaṇikārā ca pupphanti, sobhayantā mamassamaṃkaṇikākaṇikārā ca, pupphanti mama assamekaṇikākaṇikārā ca, pupphanti mama assamekaṇikākaṇikārā ca, pupphanti mama assame .
Sālā ca kaṅgupupphā ca, sobhayanti mamassamaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ambā jambū ca tilakā, nimbā ca sālakalyāṇī;
content.gathalast: Kolā bhallātakā billā, phalino mama assame.
Mante ajjhetukāmo so, chaḷaṅgaṃ nāma lakkhaṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo me chattaṃ adhāresi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.gathalast: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ekachattiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti;
Ramamāno saha tehi, vasāmi assame ahaṃ.
Āsayā abhinikkhamma, gajji so asanī viya.
Pamuccanti bhavā sabbā, phusanti amataṃ padaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo maṃ pupphehi chādesi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
content.gathalast: Tassa kammanissandena kammassa nissando (sī. syā. pī.), pupphānaṃ pūjanāya ca so (syā. pī.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Sīsaṃnhāto cayaṃ poso, pupphamākaṅkhate yadisāyaṃ pāto cayaṃ poso, pupphehi maṃ achādayi ;
‘‘‘Yaṃ yaṃ icchati kāmehi, taṃ taṃ pātubhavissati;
content.gathalast: Tattha me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā tiṇasūlakachādaniyotiṇasūlikachādaniyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Ukkoṭaṃ randhayitvānaukkoṭakaṃ randhayitvāukkoṭakaṃ randhayitvā , madhumaṃsamhimadhusappimhimadhuṃ maṃsamhi okiriṃ.
Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, labhāmi vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā madhumaṃsadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā nāgapallavo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Yāva udeti sūriyo, dīpaṃ me tāva ujjali.
Sappabhāhi sarīrassa, āloko hoti me sadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tirokuṭṭaṃtirokuḍḍaṃtirokuḍḍaṃtirokuḍḍaṃ tiroselaṃ, samatiggayha sabbatthapi evameva dissati pabbataṃ;
content.gathalast: Samatikkamma sabbatthapī evameva dissati passāmi, ekadīpassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Visamā me samā honti, andhakāro na vijjati;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ekadīpiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ucchaṅgapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Piṇḍāya te na gacchanti, oruddhanaditāya hi oruddhanadikāyatiṃ (syā.).
Devaloke manusse vā, anubhotvā sayaṃ yasaṃ (syā.) ahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo koci vedaṃ janayaṃ, saṅghe yāguṃ dadeyya so;
‘‘So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā yāgudāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Vanā piṇḍāya nikkhantaṃ, disvā cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
Ayaṃ patthodano atthi, bhojayissāmahaṃbhojayissāmi maṃ muniṃ.
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, patthodanassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Imaṃ khāda imaṃ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā patthodanadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Tena kammena jīvāmi, tena posemi dārake.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mañcadāyako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: Bhaddālī ekachatto ca, tiṇasūlo ca maṃsado;
content.gathalast: Dvesatāni ca gāthānaṃ, gāthā cekā taduttari.
